casebody.data:
Charles H. SACHS, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. STANLEY COMPANY OF AMERICA, Defendant-Appellant. No. 7647. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. April 22, 1941. Rehearing Denied May 19; 1941. Robert W. Kirkman, of Newark, N. J., for appellant. I. Arthur Weiss, of Paterson, N. J., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, MARIS, and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below is affirmed.
